refnamediv.refpurpose: Variables and functions to check the poppler version and features

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: #define POPPLER_HAS_CAIRO #define POPPLER_WITH_GDK #define POPPLER_MAJOR_VERSION #define POPPLER_MINOR_VERSION #define POPPLER_MICRO_VERSION #define POPPLER_CHECK_VERSION (major,minor,micro)

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Poppler provides version information, and information about features enabled at compile time. This is primarily useful in configure checks for builds that have a configure script, or for allowing code to optionally depend but not require a specific poppler version.

refsect1.title: Details

refsect2.title: POPPLER_HAS_CAIRO
refsect2.para: Defined if poppler was compiled with cairo support.

refsect2.title: POPPLER_WITH_GDK
refsect2.para: Defined if poppler was compiled with GDK support.

refsect1.refsect2:
POPPLER_MAJOR_VERSION POPPLER_MAJOR_VERSION#define POPPLER_MAJOR_VERSION (0)
The major version number of the poppler header files (e.g. in poppler version 0.1.2 this is 0.)
Since: 0.11

POPPLER_MINOR_VERSION POPPLER_MINOR_VERSION#define POPPLER_MINOR_VERSION (12)
The major version number of the poppler header files (e.g. in poppler version 0.1.2 this is 1.) Since: 0.11

POPPLER_MICRO_VERSION POPPLER_MICRO_VERSION#define POPPLER_MICRO_VERSION (4)
The micro version number of the poppler header files (e.g. in poppler version 0.1.2 this is 2.)
Since: 0.11

refsect2.title: POPPLER_CHECK_VERSION()
refsect2.para: Returns TRUE if the version of the poppler header files is the same as or newer than the passed-in version.
